channel.title: 6/6/6 Durial321's rampage
channel.description: As most of you might know, on the date 06/06/06 there was a brutal massacre in Fallador, world 111. Several players could attack others in the area around Fallador. This is yet another one of my part true stories. All stated here is true, however whenever I am stating my opinion I will say it's my opinion. On that day, several players could attack people outside the Wilderness, as stated befor. The one mainly responcible for this action was Durial321, however there were others involved. The reason it's Durial321 I'm stating, is because he is the one you mainly hear about when it comes to this slaughter of players. I belive this is because he was the one who "abused", as Jagex would say, this power/glitch/hack the most. I will give as much info on this as I can. When this happened Durial321 was wearing a green p hat, arhims top and bottom, abby whip(who cares what he wore anyway...). Another person believed to be involved was S T N T, who actully managed to catch this process on film(another reason to suspect him, this video can be found on YouTube by typing in runescape massacre, fally massacre, runescape 666, ect.). He in fact, unlike the others could fight back when attacked. There were several others involved, but it's not that easy to make out a mage in the middle off a huge crowd swarming all over with exitement/fear, as they could be the next victim. In this fight 2 Jagex staff members(which as far as I know are not attackable at all) and 5-7 mods. Some say there was a glitch and the wildi got transported to Fally(I think that 1s false cuz only several ppl cud atk others), others say Curse You was having a 99 construction party(he had nothing to do with the massacre), because of the mass amount of fighting in his dungeon, when he expelled everyone, the fighting still continued for some players and they gained this option. Another theory was that Durial and his gang hacked RuneScape. All I can say is... THERE SHOULD BE MORE GREAT PLAYERS LIKE DURIAL321, AND MAY HIS NAME NOT BE FORGOTTEN IN THE HISTORY OF RUNESCAPE!!! I gathered this info from certain sites, forums and videos, and once again I say- GO DURIAL!!! What matters is that Durial braught a new meaning to the word EXITING when it comes to RuneScape, he stood out, not afraid of the consequences(he and the lot did get perminatly banned :() post your coments and vote, oh, and pleese, if a mod or admin sees this pleese redirect this to the General forum, ty

THERE SHOULD BE MORE GREAT PLAYERS LIKE DURIAL321, AND MAY HIS NAME NOT BE FORGOTTEN IN THE HISTORY OF RUNESCAPE!!!

Great player?? haha, the only thing he did was abusing a bug he found.that doesnt make him a great player actually it makes him a bad player cause he abused a glitch(wich is against the rules of rs)he doesn’t deserve to get so much attention.people who deserve attention are kaitnieks(and some other people) who became known for their good skills and not by some accident
[/quote]

You say he is no hero because he abused the rules of rs2, yet you praise people like kaits for doing the same thing…Thats smart you fuck wit[/quote]
For all we know it might have been a him hacking, or maybe a simple glitch. All I know, is that anything that gives society a stir richens things up a bit. If it realy was a hack, I’ll say it again- GO DURIAL!!!
